00034 #ifndef UPNP_WANCONNECTIONSERVICE_H

00040 namespace UPnP

00042 
00043 struct PortMapping
00044 {
00045   QString  protocol;
00046   QString  remoteHost;
00047   int      externalPort;
00048   QString  internalClient;
00049   int      internalPort;
00050   int      leaseDuration;
00051   QString  description;
00052   bool     enabled;
00053 };
00054 
00055 
00066 class WanConnectionService : public Service
00067 {
00068 public:  // public methods
00069 
00070         // The constructor
00071                             WanConnectionService(const ServiceParameters &params);
00072         // The destructor
00073         virtual             ~WanConnectionService();
00074 
00075         // Add a port mapping
00076         void                 addPortMapping(const QString &protocol, const QString &remoteHost, int externalPort,
00077                                                 const QString &internalClient, int internalPort, const QString &description,
00078                                                 bool enabled = true, int leaseDuration = 0);
00079         // Delete a port mapping
00080         void                 deletePortMapping(const QString &protocol, const QString &remoteHost, int externalPort);
00081 
00082         // Return the external IP address
00083         QString              getExternalIpAddress() const;
00084         // Return true if NAT is enabled
00085         bool                 getNatEnabled() const;
00086         // Return the port mappings
00087         const KviPointerList<PortMapping>& getPortMappings() const;
00088 
00089         // Query for the external IP address
00090         void                 queryExternalIpAddress();
00091         // Query for the Nat status
00092         void                 queryNatEnabled();
00093         // Query for a port mapping entry
00094         void                 queryPortMappingEntry(int index);
00095 
00096 
00097 protected:  // protected methods
00098 
00099         // The control point received a response to callAction()

00101
